author: Roy Dictus
comment: It could have been great, but that the time remains still while in dim mode and only gets updated if you touch the screen or push the button on the Huawei Watch, makes it useless as a watch.

reply.author: Hendriksen Software
reply.content:
Hi Roy, 

Thank you for the feedback. 

We will look at resolving this in the next update for you. 

Kind Regards, 
Hendriksen Software

title: Doesn't update time in dim mode
